original_text: And when Moses was gone into the tabernacle of the congregation to speak with him, then he heard the voice of one speaking unto him from off the mercy seat that was upon the ark of testimony, from between the two cherubims: and he spake unto him.
korean_text: 모세가 회막에 들어가서 여호와께 말하려 할 때에 증거궤 위 속죄소 위의 두 그룹 사이에서 자기에게 말씀하시는 목소리를 들었으니 여호와께서 그에게 말씀하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: And when Moses was gone into the tabernacle of the congregation
then he heard the voice of one speaking unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 자기에게 말하는 한 사람의 음성을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: that was upon the ark of testimony
